original_text:
Jaziz the Hagrite was in charge of the flocks.
All these were the officials in charge of King David’s property.
korean_text: 다윗 왕의 재산을 맡은 자들이 이러하였더라

sentences.original_text: Jaziz the Hagrite was in charge of the flocks.
sentences.korean_translation: 학리트 사람 야시즈는 양 떼를 담당했었다.

sentences.original_text: in charge of King David's property.
